NVLinkErrors.longDescription: This property shall contain properties that describe NVLink errors of a device.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DataCRCCount.description: The total number of NVLink data CRC errors.
DataCRCCount.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of NVLink data CRC errors.

FlitCRCCount.description: The total number of NVLink flit CRC errors.
FlitCRCCount.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of NVLink flit CRC errors.

RecoveryCount.description: The total number of NVLink recovery errors.
RecoveryCount.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of NVLink recovery errors.

ReplayCount.description: The total number of NVLink replay errors.
ReplayCount.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of NVLink replay errors.

RuntimeError.description: An indication whether the NVLink runtime error was detected.
RuntimeError.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether the NVLink runtime error was detected.

TrainingError.description: An indication whether the NVLink training error was detected.
TrainingError.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether the NVLink training error was detected.

title: #NvidiaNVLinkMetrics
